About me

Hello! I'm Adam, a Game Developer based in UAE. I specialize in Unity and have a passion for Computers and robotics. I've worked with various technologies such as Godot, HaxeFlixel, Unity and more and I love solving problems.

Here are a few things you might want to know about me:

  • Education: I have almost finished high school in the 9th grade
  • Experience: I have Almost 5 Years of Experience in making Games
  • Age: I Am 14 Years old as of 23rd of December 2024
  • Nationality: I am Jordanian/Palestinan

You can find more about my work on GitHub.
